name.description: Specifies the name of the Dedicated Host Group. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

resource_group_name.description: Specifies the name of the resource group the Dedicated Host Group is located in. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

location.description: The Azure location where the Dedicated Host Group exists. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

platform_fault_domain_count.description: The number of fault domains that the Dedicated Host Group spans. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

zones.description: A list of Availability Zones in which the Dedicated Host Group should be located. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

tags.description: A mapping of tags to assign to the resource.

id.description: The ID of the Dedicated Host Group.

create.description: Used when creating the Dedicated Host Group.

update.description: Used when updating the Dedicated Host Group.

read.description: Used when retrieving the Dedicated Host Group.

delete.description: Used when deleting the Dedicated Host Group.
